article: facing intense bipartisan criticism on capitol hill , william kennard , chairman of the federal communications commission , offered wednesday to scale back a plan to connect schools and libraries to the internet and said his agency would make a final decision by friday .
abstract: cuts possible in online plan for schools and libraries
